signature: void putAll(Map<? extends K, ? extends V>)

direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve adding key-value pairs to the map, but putAll handles multiple entries while put handles a single entry.
Both methods throw UnsupportedOperationException, indicating similar exception handling patterns.
Both methods handle the addition of multiple key-value pairs with similar control flows and exception management.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the map to be initialized before adding entries.
putAll relies on the put method to add individual entries, indicating a dependency on the execution of put.
Both methods verify the size of the map and handle similar exceptions related to size constraints.
